search_pattern.query: PREFIX skosxl: <http://www.w3.org/2008/05/skos-xl#> PREFIX sdo: <https://schema.org/> SELECT DISTINCT ?entity ?entityLabel WHERE { ?programUri sdo:partOfSeason/sdo:partOfSeries <http://data.beeldengeluid.nl/id/series/2101608030025711131> ; sdo:genre ?entity. ?entity skosxl:prefLabel/skosxl:literalForm ?entityLabel}
SELECT DISTINCT ?entity ?entityLabel WHERE {?entity wdt:P31 wd:Q188451 . SERVICE wikibase:label { bd:serviceParam wikibase:language "en" }}

PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#> PREFIX mo: <http://purl.org/ontology/mo/> PREFIX rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#> SELECT DISTINCT ?entity ?entityLabel FROM <http://data.open.ac.uk/context/led> WHERE { ?subject mo:genre ?entity . ?entity rdfs:label ?entityLabel .}

people.query: PREFIX skosxl: <http://www.w3.org/2008/05/skos-xl#> PREFIX sdo: <https://schema.org/> SELECT DISTINCT ?rel ?entity ?entityLabel WHERE { VALUES ?starting_value {} { ?programUri sdo:partOfSeason/sdo:partOfSeries <http://data.beeldengeluid.nl/id/series/2101608030025711131> ;  (sdo:byArtist|sdo:about|sdo:mentions|sdo:creator)/ (sdo:byArtist|sdo:about|sdo:mentions|sdo:creator) ?starting_value ;sdo:genre ?entity.  ?entity skosxl:prefLabel/skosxl:literalForm ?entityLabel . } UNION { ?programUri sdo:partOfSeason/sdo:partOfSeries <http://data.beeldengeluid.nl/id/series/2101608030025711131> .  ?programUri sdo:hasPart ?sceneUri. ?sceneUri (sdo:byArtist|sdo:about|sdo:mentions|sdo:creator)/ (sdo:byArtist|sdo:about|sdo:mentions|sdo:creator) ?starting_value  ;sdo:genre ?entity. ?entity skosxl:prefLabel/skosxl:literalForm ?entityLabel .} BIND("is associated with" as ?rel)}

SELECT DISTINCT ?rel ?inverse_rel ?entity ?entityLabel WHERE { VALUES ?starting_value {} { ?entity wdt:P136 ?starting_value . ?entity wdt:P31 *wd:Q105756498 BIND(str("has genre") AS ?inverse_rel) }. SERVICE wikibase:label { bd:serviceParam wikibase:language "en" } }

PREFIX mo: <http://purl.org/ontology/mo/> PREFIX dbo: <http://dbpedia.org/ontology/> PREFIX rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#> PREFIX led: <http://led.kmi.open.ac.uk/term/> PREFIX dct: <http://purl.org/dc/terms/> PREFIX pl: <http://purl.org/NET/c4dm/event.owl#> SELECT DISTINCT ?rel ?entity ?entitylabel FROM <http://data.open.ac.uk/context/led> WHERE { VALUES ?starting_value {}  ?x mo:genre ?starting_value .  ?x (dbo:writer | mo:composer | mo:performance_of/(dbo:writer | mo:composer)) ?entity .  ?entity rdfs:label ?entitylabel .  BIND("explored by" AS ?rel) . } ORDER BY ?entitylabel

places.query: PREFIX rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#> PREFIX sdo: <https://schema.org/> SELECT DISTINCT ?rel ?entity ?entityLabel WHERE {VALUES ?starting_value {} { ?programUri sdo:partOfSeason/sdo:partOfSeries <http://data.beeldengeluid.nl/id/series/2101608030025711131> ; sdo:genre ?starting_value ; sdo:locationCreated ?blank_entity . ?blank_entity rdfs:label ?entityLabel . } UNION { ?programUri sdo:partOfSeason/sdo:partOfSeries <http://data.beeldengeluid.nl/id/series/2101608030025711131> .  ?programUri sdo:hasPart ?sceneUri. ?sceneUri sdo:genre ?starting_value; sdo:locationCreated ?blank_entity  . ?blank_entity rdfs:label ?entityLabel .} BIND("is associated with" as ?rel) BIND(IRI(CONCAT("https://cat.apis.beeldengeluid.nl/", STR(?entityLabel))) AS ?entity)} ORDER BY ?entityLabel

SELECT DISTINCT ?rel ?inverse_rel ?entity ?entityLabel WHERE { VALUES ?starting_value {} { ?starting_value wdt:P495 ?entity. BIND(str("has country of origin") AS ?rel) } UNION { ?starting_value wdt:P740 ?entity. BIND(str("has location of formation") AS ?rel) }. SERVICE wikibase:label { bd:serviceParam wikibase:language "en" } } ORDER BY ?entityLabel

genres.query: PREFIX skosxl: <http://www.w3.org/2008/05/skos-xl#> PREFIX sdo: <https://schema.org/> SELECT DISTINCT ?rel ?entity ?entityLabel WHERE { VALUES ?starting_value {} { ?programUri sdo:partOfSeason/sdo:partOfSeries <http://data.beeldengeluid.nl/id/series/2101608030025711131> ;  sdo:genre ?starting_value ; sdo:genre ?entity. ?entity skosxl:prefLabel/skosxl:literalForm ?entityLabel . } UNION { ?programUri sdo:partOfSeason/sdo:partOfSeries <http://data.beeldengeluid.nl/id/series/2101608030025711131> .  ?programUri sdo:hasPart ?sceneUri. ?sceneUri sdo:genre ?starting_value ; sdo:genre ?entity. ?entity skosxl:prefLabel/skosxl:literalForm ?entityLabel .} FILTER(?entity != ?starting_value) BIND("is associated with" as ?rel)}

SELECT DISTINCT ?rel ?inverse_rel ?entity ?entityLabel WHERE { VALUES ?starting_value {} { ?starting_value wdt:P279 ?entity. BIND(str("subclass of") AS ?rel) } UNION { ?entity wdt:P737 ?starting_value. ?entity wdt:P31 wd:Q188451 . BIND(str("influenced by") AS ?inverse_rel) } . SERVICE wikibase:label { bd:serviceParam wikibase:language "en" } } ORDER BY ?entityLabel

creative works.query: SELECT DISTINCT ?inverse_rel ?entity ?entityLabel WHERE { VALUES ?starting_value {} { ?starting_value ^<https://schema.org/genre> ?entity. ?entity rdfs:label ?entityLabel BIND(str("has subject") AS ?inverse_rel) } } ORDER BY ?entityLabel

section.title: Keep yourself versatile when it comes to music genres
section.description: Explore connections and relations of music genres. See all the results, filter and arrange them as you want.

search_pattern.query: SELECT DISTINCT ?entity ?entityLabel WHERE { ?s <https://schema.org/character> ?entity . ?entity rdfs:label ?entityLabel } ORDER BY ?entity

PREFIX mtp: <http://w3id.org/polifonia/ontology/meetups-ontology#> SELECT DISTINCT ?entity ?entityLabel FROM <http://data.open.ac.uk/context/meetups> WHERE { ?s mtp:hasSubject ?entity. ?entity rdfs:label ?entityLabel.}

PREFIX skosxl: <http://www.w3.org/2008/05/skos-xl#> PREFIX sdo: <https://schema.org/> SELECT DISTINCT ?entity ?entityLabel WHERE { { ?programUri sdo:partOfSeason/sdo:partOfSeries <http://data.beeldengeluid.nl/id/series/2101608030025711131> ;  (sdo:byArtist|sdo:about|sdo:mentions|sdo:creator)/ (sdo:byArtist|sdo:about|sdo:mentions|sdo:creator) ?entity . ?entity skosxl:prefLabel/skosxl:literalForm ?entityLabel . } UNION { ?programUri sdo:partOfSeason/sdo:partOfSeries <http://data.beeldengeluid.nl/id/series/2101608030025711131> .  ?programUri sdo:hasPart ?sceneUri. ?sceneUri (sdo:byArtist|sdo:about|sdo:mentions|sdo:creator)/(sdo:byArtist|sdo:about|sdo:mentions|sdo:creator) ?entity . ?entity skosxl:prefLabel/skosxl:literalForm ?entityLabel .} }

SELECT DISTINCT ?entity ?entityLabel WHERE {{ ?entity wdt:P106 wd:Q36834 . } UNION { ?entity wdt:P106 wd:Q639669 . } UNION { ?entity wdt:P106 wd:Q753110 . } UNION { ?entity wdt:P106 wd:Q177220 . } UNION { ?entity wdt:P31 wd:Q215380 . } SERVICE wikibase:label { bd:serviceParam wikibase:language "en" }} LIMIT 20000

PREFIX mo: <http://purl.org/ontology/mo/> PREFIX dbo: <http://dbpedia.org/ontology/> PREFIX rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#> PREFIX led: <http://led.kmi.open.ac.uk/term/> PREFIX dct: <http://purl.org/dc/terms/> PREFIX pl: <http://purl.org/NET/c4dm/event.owl#> SELECT DISTINCT ?entity ?entityLabel FROM <http://data.open.ac.uk/context/led> WHERE {?x (dbo:agent | mo:performer | dbo:writer | mo:composer | dbo:author| mo:listener) ?entity .?entity rdfs:label ?entityLabel .}

people.query: PREFIX mtp: <http://w3id.org/polifonia/ontology/meetups-ontology#> SELECT DISTINCT ?rel ?entity ?entityLabel FROM <http://data.open.ac.uk/context/meetups> WHERE {  VALUES ?starting_value {}  ?s mtp:hasSubject ?starting_value ;    mtp:hasParticipant ?participant .  FILTER  (!regex (str(?participant), str(?starting_value) ) ) .  ?participant rdfs:label ?entityLabel . BIND(str("shared a meetup with") AS ?rel) . BIND(?participant AS ?entity) } ORDER BY ?entityLabel

SELECT DISTINCT ?rel ?inverse_rel ?entity ?entityLabel WHERE { VALUES ?starting_value {} { ?starting_value wdt:P25 ?entity. ?entity wdt:P31 wd:Q5 . BIND(str("has mother") AS ?rel) } UNION { ?starting_value wdt:P22 ?entity. ?entity wdt:P31 wd:Q5 . BIND(str("has father") AS ?rel) } UNION { ?starting_value wdt:P40 ?entity. ?entity wdt:P31 wd:Q5 . BIND(str("has child") AS ?rel) } UNION {?starting_value wdt:P802 ?entity. ?entity wdt:P31 wd:Q5 . BIND(str("has student") AS ?rel)} UNION {?starting_value ^wdt:P802 ?entity. ?entity wdt:P31 wd:Q5 . BIND(str("has student") AS ?inverse_rel)} UNION {?starting_value wdt:P737/wdt:P737/wdt:P737 ?entity. BIND(str("influenced by") AS ?rel)} UNION {?starting_value ^wdt:P737 ?entity. BIND(str("influenced by") AS ?inverse_rel)}. SERVICE wikibase:label { bd:serviceParam wikibase:language "en" } } ORDER BY ?entityLabel

PREFIX mo: <http://purl.org/ontology/mo/> PREFIX dbo: <http://dbpedia.org/ontology/> PREFIX rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#> PREFIX led: <http://led.kmi.open.ac.uk/term/> PREFIX dct: <http://purl.org/dc/terms/> PREFIX pl: <http://purl.org/NET/c4dm/event.owl#> SELECT DISTINCT ?starting_value ?rel ?entity ?entitylabel FROM <http://data.open.ac.uk/context/led> WHERE { VALUES ?starting_value {} ?x mo:listener ?starting_value .  ?x (dbo:agent | mo:performer | dbo:writer | mo:composer |dbo:author) ?entity .  ?entity rdfs:label ?entityLabel .   BIND("a listener of" AS ?rel) .} ORDER BY ?entityLabel

places.query: PREFIX mtp: <http://w3id.org/polifonia/ontology/meetups-ontology#> SELECT DISTINCT ?rel ?entity ?entityLabel FROM <http://data.open.ac.uk/context/meetups> WHERE {  VALUES ?starting_value {}  ?s mtp:hasSubject ?starting_value ;    mtp:hasPlace ?place .  ?place rdfs:label ?entityLabel .  BIND(str("meetup happened at") AS ?rel) .  BIND(?place AS ?entity) }ORDER BY ?entityLabel

PREFIX rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#> PREFIX skos: <http://www.w3.org/2004/02/skos/core#> PREFIX sdo: <https://schema.org/> SELECT DISTINCT ?rel ?entity ?entityLabel WHERE {VALUES ?starting_value {} { ?programUri sdo:partOfSeason/sdo:partOfSeries <http://data.beeldengeluid.nl/id/series/2101608030025711131> ;  (sdo:byArtist|sdo:about|sdo:mentions|sdo:creator)/ (sdo:byArtist|sdo:about|sdo:mentions|sdo:creator) ?starting_value ; sdo:locationCreated ?blank_entity.  ?blank_entity rdfs:label ?entityLabel . } UNION { ?programUri sdo:partOfSeason/sdo:partOfSeries <http://data.beeldengeluid.nl/id/series/2101608030025711131> .  ?programUri sdo:hasPart ?sceneUri. ?sceneUri (sdo:byArtist|sdo:about|sdo:mentions|sdo:creator)/ (sdo:byArtist|sdo:about|sdo:mentions|sdo:creator) ?starting_value ; sdo:locationCreated ?blank_entity  . ?blank_entity rdfs:label ?entityLabel .} BIND("is associated with" as ?rel) BIND(IRI(CONCAT("https://cat.apis.beeldengeluid.nl/", STR(?entityLabel))) AS ?entity)} ORDER BY ?entityLabel

SELECT DISTINCT ?rel ?inverse_rel ?entity ?entityLabel WHERE { VALUES ?starting_value {} { ?starting_value wdt:P19 ?entity. ?entity wdt:P31/wdt:P279* wd:Q702492 . BIND(str("has place of birth") AS ?rel) } UNION { ?starting_value wdt:P20 ?entity. ?entity wdt:P31/wdt:P279* wd:Q702492 . BIND(str("has place of death") AS ?rel) } UNION { ?starting_value wdt:P937 ?entity. ?entity wdt:P31/wdt:P279* wd:Q702492 . BIND(str("has work location") AS ?rel) } UNION { ?starting_value wdt:P740 ?entity. BIND(str("location of formation") AS ?rel)} UNION { ?starting_value wdt:P495 ?entity. BIND(str("has country of origin") AS ?rel)} . SERVICE wikibase:label { bd:serviceParam wikibase:language "en" } } ORDER BY ?entityLabel

PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#> PREFIX foaf: <http://xmlns.com/foaf/0.1/> PREFIX bibo: <http://purl.org/ontology/bibo/> PREFIX schema: <http://schema.org/> PREFIX event: <http://purl.org/NET/c4dm/event.owl#> SELECT DISTINCT ?rel ?entity ?entityLabel FROM <http://data.open.ac.uk/context/led> WHERE { VALUES ?starting_value {}  {    ?starting_value schema:birthPlace ?entity .    ?entity rdfs:label ?entityLabel .    BIND("birthPlace" AS ?rel)  }  UNION  {    ?starting_value schema:deathPlace ?entity .    ?entity rdfs:label ?entityLabel .    BIND("deathPlace" AS ?rel)  }} ORDER BY ?entityLabel

creative works.query: SELECT DISTINCT ?inverse_rel ?entity ?entityLabel WHERE { VALUES ?starting_value {} { ?starting_value ^<https://schema.org/character> ?entity. ?entity rdfs:label ?entityLabel BIND(str("has subject") AS ?inverse_rel) } } ORDER BY ?entityLabel

genres.query: PREFIX skosxl: <http://www.w3.org/2008/05/skos-xl#> PREFIX sdo: <https://schema.org/> SELECT DISTINCT ?rel ?entity ?entityLabel WHERE { VALUES ?starting_value {} { ?programUri sdo:partOfSeason/sdo:partOfSeries <http://data.beeldengeluid.nl/id/series/2101608030025711131> ; sdo:genre ?starting_value;  (sdo:byArtist|sdo:about|sdo:mentions|sdo:creator)/ (sdo:byArtist|sdo:about|sdo:mentions|sdo:creator) ?entity . ?entity skosxl:prefLabel/skosxl:literalForm ?entityLabel . } UNION { ?programUri sdo:partOfSeason/sdo:partOfSeries <http://data.beeldengeluid.nl/id/series/2101608030025711131> .  ?programUri sdo:hasPart ?sceneUri. ?sceneUri sdo:genre ?starting_value;   (sdo:byArtist|sdo:about|sdo:mentions|sdo:creator)/ (sdo:byArtist|sdo:about|sdo:mentions|sdo:creator) ?entity  . ?entity skosxl:prefLabel/skosxl:literalForm ?entityLabel .} BIND("is associated with" as ?rel)}

SELECT DISTINCT ?rel ?inverse_rel ?entity ?entityLabel WHERE { VALUES ?starting_value {} { ?starting_value wdt:P136 ?entity. BIND(str("has genre") AS ?rel) } SERVICE wikibase:label { bd:serviceParam wikibase:language "en" } } ORDER BY ?entityLabel

PREFIX mo: <http://purl.org/ontology/mo/> PREFIX dbo: <http://dbpedia.org/ontology/> PREFIX rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#> PREFIX led: <http://led.kmi.open.ac.uk/term/> PREFIX dct: <http://purl.org/dc/terms/> PREFIX pl: <http://purl.org/NET/c4dm/event.owl#> SELECT DISTINCT ?rel ?entity ?entitylabel FROM <http://data.open.ac.uk/context/led> WHERE { VALUES ?starting_value {}  ?x mo:genre ?entity .  ?x (dbo:writer | mo:composer | mo:performance_of/(dbo:writer | mo:composer)) ?starting_value .  ?entity rdfs:label ?entitylabel .  BIND("works with genre" AS ?rel) . } ORDER BY ?entitylabel

topics.query: PREFIX mtp: <http://w3id.org/polifonia/ontology/meetups-ontology#> SELECT DISTINCT ?rel ?entity ?entityLabel FROM <http://data.open.ac.uk/context/meetups> WHERE { VALUES ?starting_value {} ?s mtp:hasSubject ?starting_value ; mtp:hasParticipant ?participant . FILTER  (!regex (str(?participant), str(?starting_value) ) ) . ?s mtp:hasAPurpose ?purpose . ?purpose rdfs:label ?entityLabel . BIND(str("has meetup type") AS ?rel) . BIND(?purpose AS ?entity) } ORDER BY ?entityLabel

instruments.query: PREFIX mo: <http://purl.org/ontology/mo/> PREFIX dbo: <http://dbpedia.org/ontology/> PREFIX rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#> PREFIX led: <http://led.kmi.open.ac.uk/agent/> PREFIX dct: <http://purl.org/dc/terms/> PREFIX pl: <http://purl.org/NET/c4dm/event.owl#> SELECT DISTINCT ?rel ?entity ?entitylabel FROM <http://data.open.ac.uk/context/led> WHERE { VALUES ?starting_value {}  ?x mo:instrument ?entity .  ?x (led:agent | mo:performer | mo:performance_of/(led:agent | mo:performer)) ?starting_value .  ?entity rdfs:label ?entitylabel .  BIND("plays" AS ?rel) .} ORDER BY ?entitylabel

section.title: Music connects people
section.description: Explore connections and relations of people. See all the results, filter and arrange them as you want.

search_pattern.query: prefix mtp: <http://w3id.org/polifonia/ontology/meetups-ontology#> prefix geo: <https://www.w3.org/2003/01/geo/wgs84_pos> select DISTINCT ?entity ?entityLabel from <http://data.open.ac.uk/context/meetups> where { ?entity rdf:type mtp:Location ; rdfs:label ?entityLabel; geo:lat ?lat ; geo:long ?long . }

PREFIX rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#> PREFIX sdo: <https://schema.org/> SELECT DISTINCT ?entity ?entityLabel WHERE { { ?programUri sdo:partOfSeason/sdo:partOfSeries <http://data.beeldengeluid.nl/id/series/2101608030025711131> ;sdo:locationCreated ?blank_entity . ?blank_entity rdfs:label ?entityLabel .} UNION { ?programUri sdo:partOfSeason/sdo:partOfSeries <http://data.beeldengeluid.nl/id/series/2101608030025711131> . ?programUri sdo:hasPart ?sceneUri. ?sceneUri  sdo:locationCreated ?blank_entity . ?blank_entity rdfs:label ?entityLabel .} BIND(IRI(CONCAT("https://cat.apis.beeldengeluid.nl/", STR(?entityLabel))) AS ?entity)}
SELECT DISTINCT ?entity ?entityLabel WHERE {?entity wdt:P31 wd:Q82794 . SERVICE wikibase:label { bd:serviceParam wikibase:language "en" }}

PREFIX event: <http://purl.org/NET/c4dm/event.owl#> PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#> PREFIX rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#> SELECT DISTINCT ?entity ?entityLabel FROM <http://data.open.ac.uk/context/led> WHERE {  ?event event:place ?entity .   ?entity rdfs:label ?entityLabel . }

people.query: PREFIX mtp: <http://w3id.org/polifonia/ontology/meetups-ontology#> SELECT DISTINCT ?rel ?entity ?entityLabel FROM <http://data.open.ac.uk/context/meetups>WHERE {  VALUES ?starting_value {}  ?starting_value rdf:type mtp:Location .  ?meetup mtp:hasPlace ?starting_value ;    mtp:hasParticipant ?participant .  ?participant rdfs:label ?entityLabel .  BIND(str("has meetup participant") AS ?rel) .  BIND(?participant AS ?entity) }

PREFIX skosxl: <http://www.w3.org/2008/05/skos-xl#> PREFIX sdo: <https://schema.org/> PREFIX rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#> SELECT DISTINCT ?rel ?entity ?entityLabel WHERE {VALUES ?starting_value {} BIND(STRAFTER( STR(?starting_value), "https://cat.apis.beeldengeluid.nl/" ) AS ?starting_value_label) { ?programUri sdo:partOfSeason/sdo:partOfSeries <http://data.beeldengeluid.nl/id/series/2101608030025711131> ; sdo:locationCreated/rdfs:label ?starting_value_label ;  (sdo:byArtist|sdo:about|sdo:mentions|sdo:creator)/ (sdo:byArtist|sdo:about|sdo:mentions|sdo:creator) ?entity . ?entity skosxl:prefLabel/skosxl:literalForm ?entityLabel . } UNION { ?programUri sdo:partOfSeason/sdo:partOfSeries <http://data.beeldengeluid.nl/id/series/2101608030025711131> .  ?programUri sdo:hasPart ?sceneUri. ?sceneUri sdo:locationCreated/rdfs:label ?starting_value_label; (sdo:byArtist|sdo:about|sdo:mentions|sdo:creator)/ (sdo:byArtist|sdo:about|sdo:mentions|sdo:creator) ?entity  . ?entity skosxl:prefLabel/skosxl:literalForm ?entityLabel .} BIND("is associated with" as ?rel)} ORDER BY ?entityLabel

SELECT DISTINCT ?rel ?inverse_rel ?entity ?entityLabel WHERE { VALUES ?starting_value {} { ?entity wdt:P740 ?starting_value. ?entity wdt:P31 *wd:Q105756498  BIND(str("is place of formation of") AS ?rel) }  UNION {?entity wdt:P551 ?starting_value . ?entity wdt:P106 ?occupation . ?occupation wdt:P31 wd:Q66715801 .  BIND(str("lived in") AS ?inverse_rel)}  UNION {?starting_value wdt:P483 ?entity. ?entity wdt:P31 wd:Q746369. BIND(str("recorded in") AS ?inverse_rel)}. SERVICE wikibase:label { bd:serviceParam wikibase:language "en" } } ORDER BY ?entityLabel

instruments.query: SELECT DISTINCT ?rel ?inverse_rel ?entity ?entityLabel WHERE { VALUES ?starting_value {} {?entity wdt:P1071 ?starting_value. ?entity wdt:P31 *wd:Q110295396 . BIND(str("created in") AS ?inverse_rel)} SERVICE wikibase:label { bd:serviceParam wikibase:language "en" } } ORDER BY ?entityLabel

genres.query: PREFIX skosxl: <http://www.w3.org/2008/05/skos-xl#> PREFIX sdo: <https://schema.org/> PREFIX rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#> SELECT DISTINCT ?rel ?entity ?entityLabel WHERE { VALUES ?starting_value {} BIND(STRAFTER( STR(?starting_value), "https://cat.apis.beeldengeluid.nl/" ) AS ?starting_value_label){ ?programUri sdo:partOfSeason/sdo:partOfSeries <http://data.beeldengeluid.nl/id/series/2101608030025711131> ;sdo:locationCreated/rdfs:label ?starting_value_label ;sdo:genre ?entity. ?entity skosxl:prefLabel/skosxl:literalForm ?entityLabel . } UNION {?programUri sdo:partOfSeason/sdo:partOfSeries <http://data.beeldengeluid.nl/id/series/2101608030025711131> . ?programUri sdo:hasPart ?sceneUri. ?sceneUri sdo:locationCreated/rdfs:label ?starting_value_label  ; sdo:genre ?entity. ?entity skosxl:prefLabel/skosxl:literalForm ?entityLabel .} BIND("is associated with" as ?rel)} ORDER BY ?entityLabel

places.query: PREFIX rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#> PREFIX sdo: <https://schema.org/> SELECT DISTINCT ?rel ?entity ?entityLabel WHERE {VALUES ?starting_value {} BIND(STRAFTER( STR(?starting_value), "https://cat.apis.beeldengeluid.nl/" ) AS ?starting_value_label) { ?programUri sdo:partOfSeason/sdo:partOfSeries <http://data.beeldengeluid.nl/id/series/2101608030025711131>  ; sdo:locationCreated/rdfs:label ?starting_value_label ; sdo:locationCreated ?blank_entity .?blank_entity rdfs:label ?entityLabel . } UNION { ?programUri sdo:partOfSeason/sdo:partOfSeries <http://data.beeldengeluid.nl/id/series/2101608030025711131> .  ?programUri sdo:hasPart ?sceneUri. ?sceneUri sdo:locationCreated/rdfs:label ?starting_value_label ; sdo:locationCreated ?blank_entity .?blank_entity rdfs:label ?entityLabel .} FILTER(?entityLabel != ?starting_value_label) BIND("is associated with" as ?rel) BIND(IRI(CONCAT("https://cat.apis.beeldengeluid.nl/", STR(?entityLabel))) AS ?entity)} ORDER BY ?entityLabel

section.title: What’s your next music destination?
section.description: Explore connections and relations of places. See all the results, filter and arrange them as you want.

search_pattern.query: SELECT ?entity ?entityLabel { ?entity wdt:P31 wd:Q110295396 . ?entity wikibase:statements ?outcoming . ?entity wikibase:sitelinks ?sitelinks . { SELECT (count(?s) AS ?incoming) ?entity WHERE { ?entity wdt:P31 wd:Q110295396 . ?s ?p ?entity . [] wikibase:directClaim ?p} GROUP BY ?entity} SERVICE wikibase:label { bd:serviceParam wikibase:language "en" . }.} ORDER BY DESC (?incoming)

PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#> PREFIX mo: <http://purl.org/ontology/mo/> PREFIX rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#> SELECT DISTINCT ?entity ?entityLabel FROM <http://data.open.ac.uk/context/led> WHERE {  ?subject mo:instrument ?entity .  ?entity rdfs:label ?entityLabel . }

people.query: SELECT DISTINCT ?rel ?inverse_rel ?entity ?entityLabel WHERE { VALUES ?starting_value {} { ?starting_value wdt:P61 ?entity. BIND(str("invented by") AS ?rel) } UNION { ?entity wdt:P1535 ?starting_value . BIND(str("used by") AS ?rel) } UNION { ?entity wdt:P1303 ?starting_value. BIND(str("played by") AS ?rel) } . SERVICE wikibase:label { bd:serviceParam wikibase:language "en" } }

PREFIX mo: <http://purl.org/ontology/mo/> PREFIX dbo: <http://dbpedia.org/ontology/> PREFIX rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#> PREFIX led: <http://led.kmi.open.ac.uk/agent/> PREFIX dct: <http://purl.org/dc/terms/> PREFIX pl: <http://purl.org/NET/c4dm/event.owl#> SELECT DISTINCT ?rel ?entity ?entitylabel FROM <http://data.open.ac.uk/context/led> WHERE { VALUES ?starting_value {}  ?x mo:instrument ?starting_value .  ?x (led:agent | mo:performer | mo:performance_of/(led:agent | mo:performer)) ?entity .  ?entity rdfs:label ?entitylabel .  BIND("played by" AS ?rel) .} ORDER BY ?entitylabel

places.query: SELECT DISTINCT ?rel ?inverse_rel ?entity ?entityLabel WHERE { VALUES ?starting_value {} { ?starting_value wdt:P1343 ?entity.  BIND(str("described in") AS ?rel) } . SERVICE wikibase:label { bd:serviceParam wikibase:language "en" } } ORDER BY ?entityLabel

section.title: Play your favorite instrument!
section.description: Explore connections and relations of instruments. See all the results, filter and arrange them as you want.
